mapper.insert: insert into keyword_data(user_idx, keyword_type, keyword_property, keyword) values (#{user_idx}, #{keyword_type}, #{keyword_property}, #{keyword})
mapper.update: update keyword_data set user_idx = #{user_idx}, keyword_type = #{keyword_type}, keyword_property = #{keyword_property}, keyword = #{keyword}, updateDate = now() where keyword_idx = #{keyword_idx}
mapper.select: select keyword from keyword_data where user_idx = #{user_idx} and keyword_property = '포함'
select user_idx from keyword_data where keyword = #{keyword}
select * from keyword_data where keyword_property = '포함' order by user_idx
